content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position (10.5, 10.5)), boiler (position (-6.0, 24.5)) and offshore pump (position (-9.5, 24.5))

### Iron ore mine at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and a chest (position (-16.5, -49.5))

### Furnace group at position (40.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace (position (40.0, -82.0)) and a chest (position (40.5, -80.5))
- Furnace (position (45.0, -83.0)) and a chest (position (43.5, -81.5))
- Furnace (position (42.0, -81.0)) and a chest (position (43.5, -82.5))
- Furnace (position (45.0, -80.0)) and a chest (position (43.5, -81.5))
- Furnace (position (40.0, -79.0)) and a chest (position (40.5, -80.5))

### Lab at position (unknown)
Consists of lab (lab_input={'automation-science-pack': 67})

### Inserter group at position (3.5, 0.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position (3.5, 0.5)) and a chest (position (2.5, 0.5))
- Burner inserter (position (0.5, 3.5)) and a chest (position (0.5, 2.5))

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using research
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to set research
- Ensure you have a lab with the required input before attempting to set research

### Errors when extracting items
- Ensure you have the required items in the entity before attempting to extract
- Ensure you are at the correct position before attempting to extract

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure the tile is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to place

### Errors when using furnaces
- Ensure you have the required ingredients in the furnace before attempting to smelt
- Ensure you have the required fuel in the furnace before attempting to smelt

### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure you have the required fuel in the boiler before attempting to use
- Ensure you have the required input fluid before attempting to use

### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure you have the required input fluid before attempting to use
- Ensure you have the required output pipe before attempting to use

### Errors when using generators
- Ensure you have the required input fluid before attempting to use
- Ensure you have the required output pipe before attempting to use

### Errors when using pipe groups
- Ensure you have the required input fluid before attempting to use
- Ensure you have the required output pipe before attempting to use

### Errors when using electricity groups
- Ensure you have the required poles before attempting to use
- Ensure you have the required voltage before attempting to use
